name: ACEInhibitorAllergyintoleranceCodes
title: ACE inhibitor allergy/intolerance codes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Substances that represent ACE inhibitors drugs or the drug class ACE inhibitors. It also includes Findings representing ACE inhibitor allergies in case these are mistakenly returned by the resource.),(Data Element Scope: Codes that would be in the reaction.substance field of the FHIR AllergyIntolerance resource),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes at the drug class level and the drug level, including combination medications including an ACE inhibitor. Also Finding codes representing allergies and adverse reactions.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
